LanguageData.RedMoyo_BodyStrap.label: 深海拘束帶
LanguageData.RedMoyo_BodyStrap.description: 用於拘束奴隸的綁帶裝,並預留了牽引與多人連縛用的金屬環.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_BobySuit.label: 深海緊身衣
LanguageData.RedMoyo_BobySuit.description: 用於保護茉約於環境溫度的貼身衣物.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_TacticalStrap.label: 深海戰術綁帶
LanguageData.RedMoyo_TacticalStrap.description: 深海軍事單位的制式全身戰術帶，能在不阻礙行動的狀況下配戴輔助用品
LanguageData.RedMoyo_PoliceUniform.label: 深海警服
LanguageData.RedMoyo_PoliceUniform.description: 深淵制式警服,能夠抵禦一些小型生物的撕咬與小口徑槍擊.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_HoloCamisole.label: 深海投影服
LanguageData.RedMoyo_HoloCamisole.description: 使用深海技術製造的可穿戴立場投影投射器,為了避免穿戴者感覺沒有穿衣服而害羞附贈了一雙過攜襪.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_ExoSkeleton.label: 深海外骨骼動力服
LanguageData.RedMoyo_ExoSkeleton.description: 直連神經控制的外骨骼動力裝置,能夠極大加強穿戴者的機動性,然而因為反饋系統的直連因此當服裝受損時也會受到痛苦.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_WorkSuit.label: 深海工作服
LanguageData.RedMoyo_WorkSuit.description: 為深海工程人員設計的吊帶式工作服,有許多方便放東西的口袋..
LanguageData.RedMoyo_OfficerCape.label: 深海軍官斗篷.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_OfficerCape.description: 深淵軍事力量制式的軍官服裝,除了如同防彈衣的性能外最重要的還是帥氣..
LanguageData.RedMoyo_TacticalGears.label: 深海戰術裝具
LanguageData.RedMoyo_TacticalGears.description: Standard tactical equipment for abyss military units, including integrated bulletproof breastplates and straps mounted with various combat equipment
LanguageData.RedMoyo_Helmet.label: 深海軍用頭盔
LanguageData.RedMoyo_Helmet.description: A lightweight combat helmet for moyo marines.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_PanHat.label: 深海警帽
LanguageData.RedMoyo_PanHat.description: A form of headgear worn by armed forces and law enforcement agencies in moyo society. decrease social impact.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MeleeMask.label: 深海防彈目鏡
LanguageData.RedMoyo_MeleeMask.description: A mask that protect eyes in close combat.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_SniperMask.label: 深海狙擊目鏡
LanguageData.RedMoyo_SniperMask.description: 擁有內建射控輔助系統的全覆式面罩
LanguageData.RedMoyo_GasMask.label: 深淵防毒面具
LanguageData.RedMoyo_GasMask.description: 侵入式設計的防毒面具,能夠有效的抵禦有毒物質的侵入....但戴著就是不舒服.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_TacticalHeadSet.label: 深海戰術耳機
LanguageData.RedMoyo_TacticalHeadSet.description: The tactical headset of the armed forces and law enforcement agencies, in addition to being able to communicate remotely, can also reduce mental sensitivity by playing specific audio
LanguageData.RedMoyo_AbyssArmour.label: 深淵裝甲服
LanguageData.RedMoyo_AbyssArmour.description: Heavy diving gear modified from abysstech diving gear, exceptionally tough.
LanguageData.RedMoyo_AbyssHelmet.label: 深淵裝甲盔
LanguageData.RedMoyo_AbyssHelmet.description: Helmet paired with the Abyss diving suit.
